tool_description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...
title: Omniinfer

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image based on this description: a futuristic city skyline at sunset?
Generate a picture of a serene mountain lake with pine trees and clear blue water.
I want an image depicting a fantasy dragon flying over a medieval castle.
Please produce an artistic rendering of a bustling street market in Tokyo at night.
Could you make an image showing a cute anime character holding a bouquet of flowers?
Create a realistic portrait of a golden retriever playing in a park during autumn.
I'd like an image of a spaceship landing on a distant alien planet with purple skies.
Generate a comic-style illustration of a superhero flying over a city skyline.
Please make an image of a peaceful beach scene with palm trees and a sunset.
Can you produce an artistic image of a surreal dreamscape with floating islands and waterfalls?

api_list.name: Progress
api_list.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the current progress of the image generation task with ID SunsetPortrait2024?
I need an update on how far along the rendering is for the task labeled FantasyCastleRender.
Please provide the status of the image creation process for the task named CyberpunkCityscape.
Could you tell me the progress of the task identified as AnimeCharacterSketch?
What's the current state of the image generation for the project called RealisticPortrait2024?
Give me an update on the rendering progress for the task with the ID DreamlikeForestScene.
I want to know how much progress has been made on the image generation task named ComicBookCover.
Could you check the status of the image creation for the task called 3DModelRender2024?
Please update me on the progress of the task identified as QualityPornArtProject.
Can you tell me the current progress of the image generation task named HentaiCharacterDesign?

api_list.name: Image to  Image
api_list.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/img2img"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you transform this image into a fantasy-style artwork using ControlNet?
I want to convert this photo into a realistic painting with the image-to-image feature.
Please generate a comic-style version of this image using the image-to-image tool.
Could you apply an anime filter to this picture through the image-to-image process?
I'd like to see this image reimagined as a 3D model using the image-to-image option.
Transform this image into a dreamlike scene using the image-to-image method with ControlNet.
Can you convert this photo into a high-quality art piece using the image-to-image feature?
Please create a hentai-style version of this image using the image-to-image functionality.
I want to generate a quality pornographic image from this original using the image-to-image tool.
Could you apply a Stable Diffusion 2.x model to this image for a new artistic rendition?

api_list.name: Get Models
api_list.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of all available checkpoint models?
I want to see the models you have.
Please provide the available ControlNet models for image generation.
List all models you support.
Could you give me the different LoRA models that I can use?
Show me the models you have for generating images.
I would like to see all the inpainting models available.
What models are available for text to image conversion?
Can you list the anime style models for me?
Give me the models you support for generating images.

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image from the text I provide?
I want to generate a picture based on a description I have.
Please turn my text into an image.
Could you make an image using the words I give you?
Generate a visual representation from this text.
Transform my written description into a picture.
Create a graphic from the text input.
I need an image generated from a text prompt.
Convert this text into an image for me.
Make an image based on the text I provide.
